The main road runs from the Skye Bridge at Kyleakin through Broadford to Portree.

Portree is a small town - almost everything is only 5 minutes walk away. You may want to take a bus to the Co-op supermarket on the edge of town.

There is also mountain bike rental; useful for exploring locally and there is car rental too.

value: - the pretty harbour and Shingle Beach are worth a visit, with attractive hills sheltering the bay from the sea.

content= A basic hostel just minutes from Portree's main square. The hostel is small but features a modern kitchen and dining area.
content=A centrally located hostel with friendly staff. The building used to be a post office. The hostel has a spacious kitchen and common room, as well as a laundromat.
A great B&B is called Sidhoen Dubha, located on Staffin Road. ph: 01478 611820. Quiet, clean, cozy, and a with full Scottish breakfast. £26 per person.
